translated: Dick Scobee (Dick Scobee says) is an American astronaut who was born May 19, 1939 and died in the Challenger disaster of January 28, 1986 at age 46.
original: Francis Richard Scobee (dit Dick Scobee) est un astronaute américain né le 19 mai 1939 et mort dans la Catastrophe de Challenger le 28 janvier 1986 à 46 ans.
